description: OpenTable has reversed its decision to show members' first names and profile pictures in past anonymous reviews after receiving backlash from members who felt it was a breach of privacy. [...]
title: OpenTable won't add first names, photos to old reviews after backlash

description: Medium is banning AI-generated content from its paid Partner program, notifying users that the new policy goes into effect on May 1, 2024. [...]
title: Medium bans AI-generated content from its paid Partner Program
